Module io.netty5.transport.classes.kqueue
Package io.netty5.channel.kqueue

Class KQueueChannelOption<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty5.util.AbstractConstant<ChannelOption<T>>
      • io.netty5.channel.ChannelOption<T>
        • io.netty5.channel.unix.UnixChannelOption<T>
          • io.netty5.channel.kqueue.KQueueChannelOption<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constant<ChannelOption<T>>, Comparable<ChannelOption<T>>
    @UnstableApi
public final class KQueueChannelOption<T>
extends UnixChannelOption<T>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static ChannelOption<Boolean> RCV_ALLOC_TRANSPORT_PROVIDES_GUESS
      If this is true then the RecvBufferAllocator.Handle.guess() will be overridden to always attempt to read as many bytes as kqueue says are available.
      static ChannelOption<AcceptFilter> SO_ACCEPTFILTER  
      static ChannelOption<Integer> SO_SNDLOWAT  
      static ChannelOption<Boolean> TCP_NOPUSH

        public static final ChannelOption<Boolean> RCV_ALLOC_TRANSPORT_PROVIDES_GUESS
        If this is true then the RecvBufferAllocator.Handle.guess() will be overridden to always attempt to read as many bytes as kqueue says are available.
